attributes.action: Give advanced information for year 12 and year 13 for the whole of the uk
attributes.additional_details: As year 13s are stress and there are there proper exams they deserve advanced information for the overload of work causing them stress.
attributes.background: Release information on topics and whats going to be on the test

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632547
